synopsis.text: Directly after the events of the TV series, the school festival is fast approaching, and Daigo finds himself yearning for a romantic partner to dance with at the event. Inspired by his friends' recent romantic successes, Daigo becomes determined to improve his love life. However, his methods for finding a date may not be the most conventional, as he attempts to find a nude model for a fake photo shoot and gives calculated compliments in hopes of some physical affection. Will Daigo's unconventional tactics lead him to find a girlfriend in time for the festival?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
